The iron plateskirt is a plateskirt made from iron. It has the same stats as iron platelegs but weighs less.

They can be made at level 31 Smithing with 3 iron bars, granting 75 experience.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Iron plateskirt detail.png|120px|left]]
The '''iron plateskirt''' is a plateskirt made from iron. It has the same stats as [[iron platelegs]] but weighs less.

They can be made at level 31 [[Smithing]] with 3 [[Iron bar|iron bars]], granting 75 experience.
